doc.after: Seventeen school districts exist within the city of Houston The Houston Independent School District HISD is the seventh largest school district in the United States 174 HISD has 112 campuses that serve as magnet or vanguard schools specializing in such disciplines as health professions visual and performing arts and the sciences There are also many charter schools that are run separately from school districts In addition some public school districts also have their own charter schools
